input.subject: #{_dp('{"pill_type":"project_property","property_name":"p_workato_instance"}')}: New Record for Supplier Master - Failed in Workato
input.body:
Supplier Master Data

New record could not be processed towards Oracle ERP Staging - Failed in Workato

Please find error details below -

Job ID #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"b2d9c173","path":["record","Job ID"]}')}
Found Error In Recipe#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"c5725dc4","path":["parameters","RecipeName"]}')}
Error Page#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"c5725dc4","path":["parameters","JobUrl"]}')}
Record ID #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"b2d9c173","path":["record","Record ID"]}')}
Unique ID #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"c5725dc4","path":["parameters","RecipeID"]}')}
Vendor ID #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_db_table","line":"b2d9c173","path":["record","Vendor IDs"]}')}
Vendor Name #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"c5725dc4","path":["parameters","VendorName"]}')}
Errored Type #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"c5725dc4","path":["parameters","ErrorType"]}')}
Error Message #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"c5725dc4","path":["parameters","ErrorMessage"]}')}
Step No. #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"c5725dc4","path":["parameters","ErroredStepNumber"]}')}
Errored App #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"c5725dc4","path":["parameters","ErroredApp"]}')}
Errored Action #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"c5725dc4","path":["parameters","ErroredAction"]}')}
HTTP Version (If Any) #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"c5725dc4","path":["parameters","HTTPProtocolVersion"]}')}
HTTP Status Code (If Any) #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"c5725dc4","path":["parameters","HTTPStatusCode"]}')}
HTTP Error (If Any) #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"c5725dc4","path":["parameters","HTTPStatusTextRFC"]}')}
HTTP Error Details (If Any) #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"c5725dc4","path":["parameters","HTTPResponseBody"]}')}
